cast.overview: Between personal obligations and training for his next big fight against an opponent with ties to his family's past, Adonis Creed is up against the challenge of his life.
cast.title: Creed II

details.biography: Matthew Michael Hoffman (born October 14th, 1996) is an American Actor and Filmmaker. He currently studies acting at Ensemble Actors Studio in Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania. He is a Financial Consultant by day and Actor by night. He is best known for his role in Sinfluencer (2024), as well as a short stint in background acting in the second season of Mindhunter (2019), One Dollar (2018), Creed II (2018), and Pitch Perfect 3 (2017).
details.name: Matthew Michael Hoffman
